title: Run Failure Post-mortem
summary: 1 lane(s) found with dead processes (zombie state)

rootCause.description: Lane processes were marked as running but the processes are no longer alive
symptoms: Process PIDs no longer exist in the system
No completion or error was recorded before process death

possibleCauses: System killed process due to memory pressure (OOM)
User killed process manually (Ctrl+C, kill command)
Agent timeout exceeded and process was terminated
Agent hung and watchdog terminated it

recovery.description: Resume all failed lanes from their last checkpoint
recovery.alternativeDescription: Restart all failed lanes from the beginning

previousFailures.title: Run Failure Post-mortem
previousFailures.summary: cursor-agent hung with no response - all 4 parallel lanes frozen

rootCause.description: cursor-agent was executed but received 0 bytes of response after 360+ seconds
symptoms: Heartbeat logs showing '0 bytes received' continuously
Agent process started but never produced output
All 4 independent lanes (01-04) experienced the same issue

possibleCauses: Model API rate limiting or quota exceeded
Cursor authentication token expired during long running task
Network connectivity issues to Gemini API
cursor-agent process stuck waiting for stdin/stdout pipe
recommendations: Try resume with different model: cursorflow resume --all --executor cursor-agent
Kill stale processes before resuming: kill 88192 88007 88068 88136
Consider using claude-sonnet or gpt-4 model instead of gemini-3-flash

recovery.description: Resume all failed lanes from the beginning
recovery.alternativeDescription: Resume from last checkpoint (task index 0 for all)
